_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Trainee's behavior [sn12.31:14.1]: Practicing for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding what has come to be
Practicing for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the fuel for its origination
Practicing for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding what is liable to cease
Freed by not grasping through disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding what has come to be
Freed by not grasping through disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the fuel for its origination
Freed by not grasping through disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding what is liable to cease
